page.title: 08Festivals in Haddenham
page.content: To start the month of May, Haddenham has its own{May Festival}with{Maypole {Dancers}and{Morris Men and Women. In the olden days children used to go from door to door, but now there is a {procession to the village green.}There the children put on their garlands and dance around the Maypole. The{May {Queen}is then crowned. There is also a{summer festival}with floats. Children from schools and playgroups dress up and take part in it. Girls from the{ballet school}dance to entertain everyone. In the Autumn there is a{Bazaar, a {Feast Day}and a{Fun Fair}on the village green. This has lots of rides and sideshows, and all the children have a lovely time.
